name: react-doldolyi
description: SVG loading icons component for React.

scripts.build-vendor: browserify -r babel-core/browser -r react -r react-dom -r velocity-react -o dist/browser.vendor.js
scripts.build-browser: browserify -x react -x react-dom -x velocity-react -s Doldolyi src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build-watch: watchify -x react -x react-dom -x velocity-react -s Doldolyi src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -d -v
scripts.build: npm run build-vendor && npm run build-browser && npm run build-commonjs

author: UYEONG <uyeong21c@gmail.com> (http://blog.coderifleman.com/)
